Class DecayBlockBase

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
etithespirit.orimod.common.block.decay.DecayBlockBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDecayBlock, IDecayBlockIdentifier, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecayMyceliumBlock
public abstract class DecayBlockBase extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block implements IDecayBlock
This base class represents a block associated with The Decay. It provides a crude implementation of spreading and "infecting" (replacing) other blocks as defined by IDecayBlock.

    • DecayBlockBase

      public DecayBlockBase(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour.Properties properties, boolean spreads)
      Create a new Decay block with the given properties.
      Parameters:
      properties - The properties of this block.
      spreads - Whether or not this decay block spreads (replaces certain adjacent blocks with a decay equivalent). Setting this to true will set the ticksRandomly field on the input properties. This requires that at least one replaceable block is registered in registerReplacements, otherwise this ctor will raise a IllegalStateException.
